title: Heavy metal
content:
looking for heavy metal looking fonts, like the thin lizzy logo:

comments.content: [Cortez](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221723/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27566.html?1078189772) is not very close to that one but it's heavy stuff.
